weekly_top_story.headline: Democratic Republic of the Congo and Rwanda Sign Historic Peace Agreement in Washington, D.C.
weekly_top_story.summary: The presidents of the Democratic Republic of the Congo and Rwanda formally signed a peace deal hosted by U.S. President Trump, potentially ending years of conflict and stabilizing the Great Lakes region of Africa.

stories.headline: Russia and U.S.-backed Negotiators Hold Talks in Moscow Amid Ongoing Ukraine Conflict
stories.summary: U.S. envoys Jared Kushner and Steve Witkoff met with Russian President Vladimir Putin to propose a peace plan, reflecting ongoing high-level diplomatic efforts against the backdrop of continued violence including a missile attack on Dnipro.

stories.headline: Major Snowstorm Hits U.S. East Coast After Walloping Midwest
stories.summary: A significant snowstorm that impacted the U.S. Midwest has now reached the East Coast, causing travel disruptions and highlighting increased extreme weather events.

stories.headline: Haiti Faces Escalating Violence as Armed Gangs Kill Dozens and Displace Hundreds
stories.summary: Heavily armed gangs in Haiti’s central region carried out deadly attacks, leading to significant displacement and highlighting ongoing major security crises amid political instability.
